trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents a dynamic data collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the whole list is refreshed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The type of elements in the collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The collection from which the elements are copied.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The collection parameter cannot be null.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx $xx$xxxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Occurs when an item is added, removed, changed, moved, or the entire list is refreshed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxx$ xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxx$ xxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Occurs when a property value changes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Occurs when a property value changes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Disallows reentrant attempts to change this collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Checks for reentrant attempts to change this collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Removes all items from the collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based index at which item should be inserted.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx $xx$xxxx$$xx$ xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object to insert.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Moves the item at the specified index to a new location in the collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx x xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based index specifying the location of the item to be moved.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based index specifying the new location of the item.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Moves the item at the specified index to a new location in the collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx x xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based index specifying the location of the item to be moved.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based index specifying the new location of the item.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Arguments of the event being raised.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Arguments of the event being raised.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Removes the item at the specified index of the collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based index of the element to remove.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Replaces the element at the specified index.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based index of the element to replace.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The new value for the element at the specified index.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x
